frameDefinitions: A perceptible Figure shows up against a Ground location due to Light shining on/from it, its salience possibly dependent on a Cause_of_shine.
An Earner receives Earnings by providing Goods to a Buyer; providing the Goods also generally entails a cost, which may or may not be included in the consideration.
In this frame, there is a Part of a Whole in which the Part is defined with respect to the canonical or inherent orientation of the Whole.
The Focal_feature is defined in relation to a Landmark_feature, either as a particular part, or as an immediately bordering entity.
This frame describes an Agent or an Entity meeting or not meeting a Standard.

A Researcher (an individual a group or institution) attempts to answer a Question by means of consulting literature,  observation, or conducting experiments in a particular Field pertinent to the Question.
frameExamples: This reflects the 15 % jump in <t><fex name='Earnings'>earnings</fex></t> over 1994 .
I'm on the <t>summit</t> of Mt. Shasta.
Will my coursework <t>satisfy</t> the requirements for admission?
Simmons and Nadel did <t>research</t> pertaining to Ardea purpurea and Egretta garzetta in 1998
listRoleDefinitions: The percept which is perceived at a certain <fen>Ground</fen> location.
The location of the phenomenon.
The <fen>Light</fen> which is emitted.  In this frame, it is usually incorporated in verbs and adjectives, and is the denotation of many of the nouns.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Figure</fen> is observed against the <fen>Ground</fen> location due to <fen>Light</fen> shining on it.
The spatial setting in which the <fen>Figure</fen> shows up against a <fen>Ground</fen> location.
The <fen>Earner</fen> is involved in a transaction or set of transactions as the party that receives payment.
<fen>Earnings</fen> are the money given to the <fen>Earner</fen> in a transaction, generally in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
A piece of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>.
An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s.
A stable bounded area defined by its relation to another landform. This role is incorporated in each LU in this frame.
The landform with respect to which the <fen>Focal_feature</fen> is defined.
The volitional <fen>Agent</fen> who is in line with a <fen>Standard</fen>.
The non-agentive <fen>Entity</fen> that is in line with a <fen>Standard</fen>.
An occurrence or action that brings about the satisfaction or nonsatisfaction of a <fen>Standard</fen>.
The condition or requirement that the <fen>Agent</fen>, <fen>Entity</fen>, or <fen>Event</fen> satisfy (or not).
The <fen>Time</fen> in which satisfaction of the <fen>Standard</fen> occurs.
The people engaged in a research endeavor.
An area of inquiry.
A significant unanswered open proposition which the <fen>Researcher</fen> is attempting to resolve.
A phenomenon or idea involved in a <fen>Question</fen>.
The time when  the research is carried out.
The physical place where the research is carried out.
listRoleExamples: Hot coals glowed <fex>behind the fire grate</fex>.
<fex>In the morning</fex> the grass glistened with dew
<fex>Outside</fex> something was shimmering on the shore.
She made a lot of money <fex>in Africa</fex> .
The top <fex>shelf</fex> of the bookcase was lying on the floor.
The show takes place in the West wing <fex>of the White House</fex>.
Before he became an astronaut, <fex>Grunsfeld</fex> did research in physics.
When we have researched <fex>why Brazilian mothers have stopped breastfeeding</fex>, principal reasons given are 'poor milk' and 'insufficient milk' .
Would you take part in research <fex>on the best place to have a baby</fex>?

<fex>During summer of 1999</fex>, I did research using a technique called 'Path Integral Monte
Carlo', to simulate quantum particles.
Johnson and Randall's research <fex>in Africa</fex> has proven extremely valuable.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Creating a Brand Icon through Design"
